title: INsmh
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ITV A Cruel Love: Ruth Ellis said six very calm words after shooting abusive husband
items.description: Aged just 28, Ruth Ellis became the last woman hanged in Britain on July 13, 1955, with her story now turned into an ITV series, A Cruel Love: The Rut...

items.title: This is why an entire town plays a brutal 16-hour football game on Shrove Tuesday
items.description: Shrovetide ball games have been played in England since Henry II was on the throne.

items.title: 'Much-loved dad', 75, 'punched and kicked to death' by three teenage girls in Islington pictured
items.description: Fredi Rivero, 75 was taken to hospital where he died on Friday, February 28, after allegedly being attacked by three teenage girls in Seven Sister’s R...

items.title: The unusual psychic technique used by the MoD to try and find Osama bin Laden
items.description: 'It was a classic low probability high consequence situation, in that even if people were skeptical, the impact of any successes would be huge.'

items.title: Former CIA agent claims there was life on Mars and he saw ‘bones’ on the surface
items.description: 'It [was] obvious these people were dying for some reason, but they were humans. They were just twice our size.'

items.title: Man With The Golden Arm dies aged 88 after saving lives of 2,400,000 babies
items.description: James Harrison saved millions of lives by donating his extremely rare blood plasma.

items.title: Europe holds breath as Keir Starmer insists Trump is still reliable despite Ukraine betrayal
items.description: Donald Trump has paused intelligence sharing and military aid to Ukraine in a move Keir Starmer heard will 'mean more brave Ukrainians will die'

items.title: Teenager has 16kg ‘parasitic twin’ removed after life-changing surgery
items.description: Less than 50 instances of the phenomena have been recorded by science.

items.title: Kendal tragedy: Child dies after being hit by car driven on sports pitch as BMW driver arrested
items.description: A child has died after a car reportedly drive onto a football pitch at Kendal Rugby Union Football Club in Westmorland and Furness in Cumbria

items.title: German Romantics Climb Oak Tree Instead Of Scrolling Tinder
items.description: It’s timber over Tinder in a forest in northern Germany where the Bridegroom’s Oak has connected lovers for more than a century.

items.title: ITV A Cruel Love: True tragedy of Ruth Ellis who shot her abusive lover dead
items.description: New ITV drama A Cruel Love retells the haunting story of Ruth Ellis - exploring her heartbreak and abuse that led to a fateful decision.
